newsitem.title: USA: Artisoft's president Kocher to leave.
newsitem.headline: Artisoft's president Kocher to leave.

text.p: Artisoft Inc on Friday said President Joel Kocher is leaving the company, effective today, to take a position with a company in Austin, Texas.
William Keiper will serve as company president and maintain his duties as chairman and chief executive officer.

"Over the past two years, Joel has been a key contributor to the transformation of Artisoft," Keiper said in a statement. "During his tenure, he has helped to build a strong team, and we wish him all the best as he moves on."
Kocher has been president since October 1995, when he joined Artisoft from Dell Computer Corp.
Artisoft makes networking, communications and computer telephony products for business.
